resources.string:
Whatâ€™s New with Field Nation

Improved overall performance, made updates to our counter offer dialog, and added Android O support to improve help your experience.

What we added:
  • Problem reported status indicator
  • Work order on hold status indicator
  • Ability to review profile photo before submitting
  • Choose which work order contact to dial
  • Payment information enhancements
  • Android O support
Bugs we fixed:
  • Allow users to submit a counter offer
  • Crash around sharing files with app
  • Numerous small bugs
